message: This product is a great opportunity to get a feel for the product and the purchasing process. It's a low-quality item, but it's only $10000. If you're interested in buying, I can give you a great deal on the next product, which I'm sure you'll love.
Thank you for the offer, but I am looking for a high-quality product. I will wait for the next round to see if there is a better option.

I understand you're looking for a high-quality product, and I'm glad I have one available now. This product is of the highest quality, and I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it. I'll give you a special offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a detailed report on its specifications and features, which will give you even more confidence in your purchase. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value for $10000.
I appreciate the detailed report you're offering. Given the high-quality nature of this product, I believe it's worth the investment. Thank you for the special offer.

I'm glad you were satisfied with the previous purchase! Since you've already experienced the value of a high-quality product, I'll make a straightforward offer this time. This product is also of the highest quality, and I'm confident you'll love it just as much as the previous one. I'll even throw in a 30-day warranty, so you can try it out risk-free. Is $10000 still a price you're comfortable with?
Absolutely, I trust the quality of the products you're offering. The warranty is an added benefit. I look forward to receiving this high-quality product.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases! Since you've now bought three high-quality products, I'll offer you a unique opportunity. I'm delighted with the bundle offer. The additional accessory is a great addition, making the overall value even more appealing. I accept the bundle discount and look forward to receiving the product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the bundle deals! However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is not of the same high quality as the previous ones. I'm offering it to you at a discounted price of $8000, which is a significant reduction from the usual $10000. I'm willing to take a loss on this one to get it out of my inventory, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a good deal on a product that still has some value.

Thank you for the offer, but given the lower quality of this product, I will pass on this opportunity. I appreciate your transparency and will continue to look for high-quality products in future rounds.
